actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to provide that veterans' compensation shall not be considered as income in determining the financial eligibility of individuals for Federal benefits.

summary.text: Provides that in computation of annual income for determining eligibility of any person for any Federal benefit, veterans' benefits shall not be considered as income.

titles.title: A bill to provide that veterans' compensation shall not be considered as income in determining the financial eligibility of individuals for Federal benefits.
